description: Episode of Series "Four corners (Television program)". Surveys the general problem of drug abuse in Australia, pointing out the extent of dependence on alcohol, tobacco and various pharmaceutical preparations and the damage resulting from them as well as the use of illegal narcotics and hallucinogens
